sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_feast (f_applyer_id, f_mate_id, f_fasttype, f_applytime, f_state, f_join_count, f_isreceive1, f_isreceive2, f_gift_amount, f_line) values (#applyerId:INTEGER#, #mateId:INTEGER#, #fasttype:INTEGER#, #applytime:BIGINT#, #state:INTEGER#, #joinCount:INTEGER#, #isreceive1:BIT#, #isreceive2:BIT#, #giftAmount:INTEGER#, #line:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update t_feast set f_applyer_id = #applyerId:INTEGER#, f_mate_id = #mateId:INTEGER#, f_fasttype = #fasttype:INTEGER#, f_applytime = #applytime:BIGINT#, f_state = #state:INTEGER#, f_join_count = #joinCount:INTEGER#, f_isreceive1 = #isreceive1:BIT#, f_isreceive2 = #isreceive2:BIT#, f_gift_amount = #giftAmount:INTEGER#, f_line = #line:INTEGER# where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
